name: travis-plugins
description: ThrownLemon's Claude Code plugin marketplace - code quality, productivity, and development tools

plugins.name: coderabbit
plugins.description: CodeRabbit integration - local code review and PR comment management using CodeRabbit CLI

plugins.name: damage-control
plugins.description: Security protection - blocks dangerous commands and protects sensitive files via PreToolUse hooks

plugins.name: fork-terminal
plugins.description: Fork terminal sessions to spawn parallel AI agents (Claude Code, Codex CLI, Gemini CLI) in new terminal windows. Supports git worktrees for isolated parallel development with tmux integration.

plugins.name: imagegen
plugins.description: AI image generation using Google Gemini (Imagen) and OpenAI GPT-Image - generate, edit, iterate, moodboards, character sheets, and project assets

plugins.name: ui-ux-pro-max
plugins.description: UI/UX design intelligence - 57 styles, 96 color palettes, 50 font pairings, 25 chart types, 11 tech stacks. Searchable database of design best practices.

plugins.name: gmcli
plugins.description: Gmail CLI integration - search, read, send, and manage emails from the terminal using gmcli

plugins.name: audio-feedback
plugins.description: Audio feedback for Claude Code - sound effects and voice announcements via Kokoro TTS for session events, tool completions, and task notifications

plugins.name: video-gen
plugins.description: AI video generation using Google Veo and OpenAI Sora - generate videos from text prompts with smart model routing

plugins.name: multi-ai-review
plugins.description: Multi-AI code review - run parallel reviews with Claude, Gemini, and Codex CLIs, then compare findings for consensus analysis

plugins.name: ultimate-statusline
plugins.description: Ultimate statusline for Claude Code - 30+ widgets including model info, git status, context usage, costs, burn rate, MCP status, and more with customizable themes
